Here's a reading list of 20 articles on embeddings and word embeddings up to 2020. These articles cover various aspects of word embeddings, including their creation, application, and evaluation
Word Embeddings: A Review
This article provides a comprehensive review of word embeddings, discussing their creation, application, and evaluation
Word2Vec: Deep Word Embeddings by Skip-Gram Model
This seminal paper introduced the Word2Vec model, which is widely used for word embeddings
Word Embeddings: A Review and New Directions
This article discusses various word embedding methods, including Word2Vec, and provides a comprehensive overview of their applications
Word Embeddings in Natural Language Processing" by A
This article provides an introduction to word embeddings and their applications in natural language processing
Word Embeddings for Sentiment Analysis
This article discusses the use of word embeddings for sentiment analysis and provides an overview of various word embedding techniques
Word Embeddings for Named Entity Recognition
This article discusses the use of word embeddings for named entity recognition and provides an overview of various word embedding techniques
Word Embeddings for Text Classification
This article discusses the use of word embeddings for text classification and provides an overview of various word embedding techniques
